name: Othersider
description:
A game created in 48 hours for the 2022 Global Game Jam, inspired by the theme "Duality."

Control one character across multiple levels simultaneously, carrying your momentum between worlds.

Controls (DualSense / Keyboard):

Move: Joystick / Arrow Keys

Jump: cross / X

Dash: square, R1 / Z, Y

Switch World: circle, L1 / space
